Key Match Events: Raphinha scored a penalty in the 38th minute
Raphinha scored a goal in the 54th minute
Andreas Pereira scored a stunning overhead kick in the 71st minute
Luiz Henrique scored an unstoppable finish in the 74th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Brazil move four points above the final automatic qualification position
Peru's chances of reappearing at the World Cup after missing out in 2022 now look to be through the sole seventh-place inter-confederation playoff position
Miscellaneous Highlights: Brazil improved their chances of continuing their unmatched record of being the only nation to have appeared at every FIFA World Cup tournament since 1930
The officials correctly deemed Edison Flores to have strayed beyond the shoulder of the last defender before he slotted the ball past Ederson
Others: Raphinha was named Flashscore Man of the Match
